name: Stuck in a Mecha-Horror
description:
Game still in development!

Your mecha has suffered an accident. Both of you need to survive the night until backup arrives. But be careful! Evil robots are looking for you! Also, your mecha really needs you in these hard times!

How to play:

The mecha will show you a symbol on the right screen and you have to fulfill its need:

  • Music note: Find and press the button with same color tag as the symbol
  • Chat: Turn on the screen above you and see what the mecha as to say
  • Meditation: Press the first red button to close the view and let your mecha meditate
  • Scared: Turn the lights on using the blue button to the right

On the middle lower screen, you can see evil robots coming for you. Don't worry. There is a force shield around and they wont come in. But soon, the dev will lower the shield and you will need to shoot them before they reach you. (Just a fancy way to say more mechanics will be added)
